articles.author: Liam Wood
articles.title: Chelsea in pole position for £100m striker as West Ham 'target' Armando Broja deal - Football.London
articles.description: Chelsea transfer news: The latest Blues media briefing from Stamford Bridge with reaction to stories on Brighton striker Evan Ferguson and in-demand Armando Broja
articles.content: Chelsea have splashed the cash since Todd Boehly stepped into the Stamford Bridge boardroom last summer and the outlay under their American-led takeover is edging closer to the £1billion barrier. A s… [+3952 chars]
